name: Rabbitoad
description:
“When you climb the tower on top of that mountain
Have the goddess grant her wishes "

A frog-like rabbit is the main character's high-difficulty 2D action
In order to fulfill the wish that "I will not be mistaken for a frog"
Aim for the place of the goddess.


1.Use the mouse pointer to determine the direction of the jump
2.Press and hold the mouse to charge power
3.Release the mouse click to jump


・ You can acquire special skills by using the ★ collected on the stage.
・Basically a stage clear type game.
・A formidable boss or a long stage awaits at the end of the level
